outputs.output_descr:
The project aims to enhance and strengthen the administrative and operational capacity of Iraqi justice institutions through enhancement of the justice sector IT management and support of the data integration in Iraq. In order to ensure that the data exchange between justice institutions is done in a timely, secure, accurate and verifiable way the project will support the establishment of an institutional framework conducive for inter  ministerial coordination on Justice issues and will support the establishment of the Justice Data Exchange that builds upon UNDPs previous work with a case management system. The project will also build upon the outcomes of the Iraqi Justice Integration Project (IJIP) which was supported by the US Department of State between 2005 and 2011. 
The overall  purpose of this project will to develop a pilot system based on a thorough justice data integration strategy which will be extended during a second phase under the leadership of the  Inter Agency Working Group.

project_title: INL- Justice Data Management in Iraq
